text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Nnya~……huh? Fuwaaa~ah…… Ah~ not good……I fell asleep~……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Geez, you finally woke up. ……Here, I made you some hot cocoa. Drink it carefully, okay? It's gotten really cold right now, hasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Waa-! Ehehe, as expected of Cesario…… Thanks, I'll take it.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Haa, that really warmed me up~……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: I'm glad. ……And so, were you able to enjoy your first sunbathing session of the year?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it was great♪ The once per year luxury of basking in the sun, taking a nap during the first sunrise……together with some of Cesario's cocoa!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: That's part of the set? That makes me happy though…… Fufufuu. Kraft, you really love sunbathing, huh?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Ah, but……it's probably time to get changed, and start getting ready. Otherwise you might be late for our shrine visit.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Wah, you're right! I'm going to head back to my room! Cesario, wait for me by the front gate~!!
A New Year. Rhein Kraft and Cesario were now in their Classic year, and we had decided to go as a group for the first shrine visit of the new year, but――

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah, geez, everyone, are you keeping up!? Respond if you can hear me-!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Hii, hii……For now, I am~.

text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: It's crazy how crowded it is~……we were packed in there so tight, that I thought all that osechi I ate earlier was going to come out~……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: I have a suggestion. From what I've observed, the congestion has eased a bit on the right side. The lines have yet to form so I think we should move now.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Also, let's decide on a meeting place to gather up in after the visit. It would probably be easiest to find each other over by the sacred tree.

text_block_list.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: That's true……! Oh man~, when Cesario's switch is on, she's really got it together and is really reliable.
And so, despite the huge crowd, we were somehow able to safely wrap up our shrine visit.
(……this year, I'll give it my all to support the team. Please watch over them, and may they get the results they desire――)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hey, you're taking too long. The line is piling up behind us. Geez……come on, let's go.
(And now that we'd wrapped up our shrine visit, and since it was the new year, I felt we should take it easy, however――)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ehehe……thanks for tagging along with our independent training! When I think about how this is the start of my classic year, I can't help but get restless.
choice_data_list: I'm glad you're both so motivated
I'm glad you're both so motivated

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: I'm also thankful to our senpais. This year, I look forward to your continued guidance and support.

text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Ah, no prob……or rather, hearing our kouhais say they want to run makes it really hard to say "We're heading back~"……

text_block_list.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Are you an idiot! You should have just said that it was motivating you, even if it was a lie! ……Ah, but, it's not a lie though!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Well, in any case, I think it's a good idea. There are so many once-in-a-lifetime races…… it makes the Classic year a very special year.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……speaking of that, have you two thought of which races you're going to aim for?

text_block_list.name: Kraft & Cesario
text_block_list.text: The 『Oka Sho』.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ……that's right. Cesario and I have…… already decided on the Triple Tiara route.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Right. It was decided from the start. 『Oka Sho』 『Oaks』 『Shuuka Sho』 is the route I've decided to run.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: The Uma Musume that have taken on the Triple Tiara rotation aren't just strong――they've filled the racing world with grace and beauty.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: All the way up until now, many spectators and even Uma Musume have been fascinated by their efforts. Many run now, dreaming of wearing that tiara.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Me too――I want to become an Uma Musume that continues on as part of that history.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……In addition to that, many Uma Musume that have achieved results in the Triple Tiara rotation have gone on to train the next generation, linking everything to the future.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: It's still a far off dream, however…… someday, I'd like to be a part of that too.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: To me, obtaining results in the Triple Tiara rotation was part of my dream since the beginning.
(What Cesario was speaking about was part of the history, tradition, and appeal of the Triple Tiara route)
(There was nothing wrong with that――however. There was still one thing I'd have to remind them of……)
Generally speaking, the Classic Triple Crown, the 『Satsuki Sho』 『Japan Derby』 and 『Kikka Sho』 ――honestly, they draw much more attention.
Typically, when it comes to Triple Crown versus Triple Tiara Uma Musume, the former have achieved better results.
To put it plainly, 『Triple Crown girls are stronger than Triple Tiara girls』……That's the general consensus.
To put it plainly, 『Triple Crown girls are stronger than Triple Tiara girls』……That's the general consensus.
……Even knowing that, do you still feel the same way?
……Even knowing that, do you still feel the same way?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: But that's just――how it is 『now』 right?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Someday……no, soon, I think that will change. Between Triple Crown and Triple Tiara it doesn't matter……『Strong Uma Musume are strong』!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I know an Uma Musume who's said that. I believe that too. Because I've looked up to that Tiara, and I've been watching this whole time――!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I know about the passion, the emotion, and the strength of those Uma Musume! I know they're not worse than the others!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: And that's why I'm choosing the Triple Tiara rotation. And, I'll become strong enough that I won't lose against Triple Crown Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: What kept me going……what gave me all of my inspiration, was those Triple Tiara senpais. So I want to prove their merit, their strength!
Sorry for saying something so insensitive. I understand both of your feelings. In your Classic year, the first major goal for both of you is to win the 『Oka Sho』!

text_block_list.name: Kraft & Cesario
text_block_list.text: Yes!!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ……Huuu. And so another two――huh. Thinking about it, it's still a mystery.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: More attention is on the Triple Crown. And the race called the 『Greatest Dream』, the 『Japan Derby』.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Despite that, every year, without fail, more girls like that always appear. Girls that desire the Tiara more than the Triple Crown or the glory of the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: However, there are some things……that can only be obtained, only brought together in that place, on that stage. Where the Tiara is.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: That's why, this year, once again――the curtain will rise on the brilliant and fierce stage of the Tiara.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Well then……Rhein Kraft, and Cesario. What will you carve in to that beautiful theater--?
